synopsis.text:
Their world turned upside down on a sweltering August day, when Shintaro, a recluse who hadn't stepped outside for two years, is compelled to venture out into the bustling world. Caught in a hostage crisis at a local store, he crosses paths with the enigmatic Mekakushi-Dan, a group of teenagers with extraordinary eye abilities.

Shintaro's life had been a monotonous routine of solitude, accompanied only by Ene, a peculiar cyber girl residing within his computer. But when an argument leads to a damaged PC, he is forced to seek a replacement, leading him to the fateful encounter with the Mekakushi-Dan.

As the hostage situation unfolds, the Mekakushi-Dan use their unique powers to resolve the crisis, drawing Shintaro and Ene into their eccentric group. With each member's past shrouded in mystery and their powers seemingly interconnected, the group's mission is clear: to uncover the truth behind their strange abilities.

Based on the popular series of songs by Jin, this thrilling anime follows Shintaro, Ene, and the Mekakushi-Dan as they navigate through a world of hidden powers, unexpected connections, and the relentless pursuit of the truth. Will they be able to solve the mysteries behind their eye abilities and unveil the secrets that bind them together? Only time will tell.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
